articles.author: Jenna Portnoy
articles.title: On four year anniversary of covid, families remember flags on Mall - The Washington Post
articles.description: Covid memorial flags are being archived as America moves further from the World Health Organization’s pandemic declaration, four years ago this month.
articles.content: Return to menuEd Koenig searched up one row and down the next, up and down, for hours. But on that warm, breezy day in September2021, he couldnt find the flag he had dedicated online to Jody Settle, … [+2043 chars]
